Description: Small silk cloth (face veil or head veil?); large tartan design with shot effects in dark pink, yellow, dark green and black. Warp: silk, Z-spun, ca 26 threads/cm. Weft: silk, without twist, ca 30 threads/cm. Edge: two plain selvedges, two short fringes without knots.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Maj William Joseph Myers (executors of)
